mapper.select:
select a.id as visitId, a.visit_no as visitNo, b.settle_no as settleNo, b.id as settleId, ps.payment_settle_id as paymentSettleId, ps.total_price as totalPrice, ps.payment_price as paymentPrice, ps.pay_code as payCode from outpt_visit a join outpt_settle b on a.id =b.visit_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code join payment_settle ps on ps.settle_id = b.id and ps.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where b.is_settle ='1' and b.status_code ='0' and ps.settle_code ='2' and ps.status_code ='0' and ps.settle_time and ps.pay_code =#{PayCode} /*开始日期*/
and date(pa.settle_time) >= date(#{startTime})
/*结束日期*/
and date(ps.settle_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by b.id
